custom-sql.sql: SELECT opencps_statistic.* FROM opencps_statistic WHERE (opencps_statistic.month = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.year = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.groupAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC

SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier WHERE (opencps_dossier.registerBookCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.processNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.serviceCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.applicantIdType = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.applicantIdNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.cityCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.districtCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.wardCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.contactTelNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.contactEmail = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.delegateIdNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.delegateTelNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierSubStatus = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierActionId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.viaPostal = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.online_ = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.serverNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.originDossierId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.originality = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.releaseDate IS NULL OR [$SPECIFY_RELEASE_DATE$]) AND (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.receiveDate >= ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus != 'denied' OR opencps_dossier.dossierStatus != 'cancelled') AND (opencps_dossier.releaseDate IS NOT NULL) AND (opencps_dossier.dueDate IS NOT NULL) AND (opencps_dossier.extendDate IS NOT NULL) AND (opencps_dossier.extendDate > opencps_dossier.dueDate) AND (opencps_dossier.dueDate IS NULL) OR (opencps_dossier.releaseDate <= opencps_dossier.dueDate) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = 'procesing' OR opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = 'interoperating') AND (opencps_dossier.dueDate IS NULL OR opencps_dossier.dueDate > ?) AND (opencps_dossier.originDossierId = 0 AND opencps_dossier.dossierActionId != 0)

SELECT opencps_voting_statistic.* FROM opencps_voting_statistic WHERE (opencps_voting_statistic.month = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.year = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.votingCode = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_voting_statistic.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC

SELECT opencps_person_statistic.* FROM opencps_person_statistic WHERE (opencps_person_statistic.month = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.year = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.votingCode = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.employeeId = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_person_statistic.groupId = ?) ORDER BY month DESC
